schema.description: name of the subschema detailed in the definitions of the root schema. Empty if the root schema should be used

input.description: name of the input file used in the test, found in 'tests/data/input'. ie: calypso_support_minimal.json

expected.description: the expected result of the test

result.description: The result code of the test. 'ok' if the input is validated by the schema. 'failure' otherwise.

error_message.description: The error message when the test checks for a failed validation. This is useful to verify that a rule is properly enforced, and only present when the test checks for a failed validation
